SELECT CASE WHEN TB.pcm_uuid is null THEN 'INSERT' ELSE 'NOINS' END AS gubun, TA.pu_seq as pcm_seq, TA.org_seq, TA.updt_ap_seq as pa_seq, TA.pcm_uuid, TA.pcm_name, (select deb_apply_name from tbl_policy_package_list where pu_seq = TA.pu_seq)as deb_apply_name, (select deb_new_version from tbl_policy_package_list where pu_seq = TA.pu_seq)as deb_new_version, TA.RGSTR_DATE, TB.updt_ap_seq as old_pa_seq, TB.pcm_uuid as old_pcm_uuid, '' as pu_status FROM tbl_updt_agent_job TA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_updt_agent_job WHERE updt_ap_seq = #{old_pa_seq} and pcm_uuid = #{pcm_uuid} ) TB on TA.pu_seq = TB.pu_seq WHERE TA.org_seq = #{org_seq} and TA.updt_ap_seq in ( #{new_pa_seq}, #{old_pa_seq} ) and TA.pu_seq in ( ${ppm_seq} ) and TB.pcm_uuid is null and TA.pcm_uuid = #{pcm_uuid} and TA.pcm_name is not null
